author: scottbw
msg: Implemented updating of widgets including any changes in config.xml - previously Wookie just overwrote files in the package but did not update any of the widget metadata, resulting in some odd "caching" type behaviour as changes to things like height and width wouldn't "take".

author: cschneider
msg: CXF-3419 Fixes for jaxrs test failures

author: mxmanghi
msg: added export of commands implemented in tcl. init.tcl now imports the rivet namespace
